pages.text: $(marked)Simulacra$() are reflections of $(marked)Great Old Ones$() upon the face of the world. They reflect their very being, though sometimes their presence is uncalled for...$(br2)Casting this rite will remove the closest simulacrum; however, a few requirements must be met before casting it.

This rite targets the core of the simulacrum. These cores are usually maintained by means of a peculiar setup usually involving an Octagram. Get to the very center of the core, remove the setup to deactivate the core, then cast this rite.$(br2)Note that deactivating a simulacrum is not enough to remove it. You will still have to cast this rite, even if there is no Octagram to maintain the simulacrum.

Clearing a simulacrum will earn you the wrath of its inhabitants. Make sure to arrange proper defenses for yourself, as you will be unable to interact with your surroundings during this procedure.$(br2)As for the actual procedure of the rite, having to step inside the Octagram once it has started is all you need to be aware of.
